cause.description:
PCRF is a non-profit organization which was founded in 1982. Since its opening, it has raised over $20 million to fund its research. Great strides in the field have been accomplished. For example, childhood leukemia, once considered almost certainly fatal, now has a 70% survival rate. PCRF has had great success in its field and hopes to continue doing so.
1. Childhood cancer is a battle that is far from over, but one that must be won.
cause.mission: Improve the care, quality of life, and survival rate of children with malignant diseases
cause.name: Pediatric Cancer Reasearch Foundation
